name: Cryptaurus
printed_effect:
This Cryptaurus gets +2 {attack} for each
time you Foretold this turn.
You can Expend {lunar} in order to Foretell 3 and add
any number of {lunar} Elestrals that cost at least
2 Spirits Foretold this way to your hand.
effect: This Cryptaurus gets +2 {attack} for each time you Foretold this turn. You can Expend {lunar} in order to Foretell 3 and add any number of {lunar} Elestrals with an Enchantment Cost of 2 or more Foretold this way to your hand.
